Class ParserData

java.lang.Object
server.DataJSON
public class ParserData
extends java.lang.Object
ParserData is a class which allows to parse the JSON

    • unionMarksBySubjectForClass

      Parameters:
      name_class - The name of a class
      Returns:
      A JSON Object with as keys (a subject) / values (all marks of this subject)

    • unionMarksBySubjectForClassSpecialExam

      Join all the marks of an exam given of a subject given for a class where the name of this class given
      Parameters:
      name_class - The name of a class
      id_mark - The id of an exam
      name_subject - The name of a subject
      Returns:
      A JSON Object with as keys (a subject) / values (all marks of an exam of this subject)
